casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Dixon, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Dixon (1995), 71 Ohio St.3d 608.]

*609(No. 94-220 Submitted February 7, 1995 Decided March 15, 1995.) William F. Schenck, Greene County Prosecuting Attorney, and Robert K. Hendrix, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant. Martin, McCarty, Richman & Wright Co., L.P.A., and Gary E. Wright, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed as to the certified issue only, and the judgment of the trial court is reinstated on the authority of State v. Murphy (1990), 49 Ohio St.3d 206, 551 N.E.2d 932.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur.
